DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Radiation therapy use high-energy x-rays damage tumor cell . Giving radiation surgery follow external-beam radiation entire breast may kill tumor cell . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness radiation therapy surgery follow whole-breast radiation therapy treat woman undergone lumpectomy ductal carcinoma situ invasive breast cancer
DOC.brief_title: Radiation Therapy After Lumpectomy Treating Women With Ductal Carcinoma Situ Invasive Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine effect intraoperative radiotherapy boost tumor bed acute complication lumpectomy ( whole breast irradiation ) woman ductal carcinoma situ invasive adenocarcinoma breast . - Determine local recurrence rate patient treated regimen . - Determine cosmetic outcome patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : Patients undergo excisional biopsy surgery follow intraoperative dose radiation tumor cavity . Postoperatively , patient undergo external beam radiotherapy entire breast 5 day week 5-6 week . Patients follow 1 month every 3 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 25 patient accrue study within 2 year .
